io.netty.channel.pool

Interface ChannelHealthChecker


  • public interface ChannelHealthChecker
    Called before a Channel will be returned via ChannelPool.acquire() or ChannelPool.acquire(Promise).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ChannelHealthChecker ACTIVE
      ChannelHealthChecker implementation that checks if Channel.isActive() returns true.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Future<Boolean> isHealthy(Channel channel)
      Check if the given channel is healthy which means it can be used.

    • Field Detail

      • ACTIVE

        static final ChannelHealthChecker ACTIVE
        ChannelHealthChecker implementation that checks if Channel.isActive() returns true.

    • Method Detail

      • isHealthy

        Future<Boolean> isHealthy(Channel channel)
        Check if the given channel is healthy which means it can be used. The returned Future is notified once the check is complete. If notified with Boolean.TRUE it can be used Boolean.FALSE otherwise. This method will be called by the EventLoop of the Channel.
